fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Shoot a player at night. Not usable Night 1, or the night after shooting a Townie.
- Falsify the death of another Townie. This can only be used the night after shooting a Townie.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Falsifying a player's death deals an Unstoppable attack, makes them appear as a Vigilante (67) on death, and you may change their will as you please. You learn the original role and will, and they appear to die of guilt.
- **You are not required to falsify a player's death,** but you can only do it immediately after the night you shoot a Townie.
- When shooting a player, they appear to have been killed by a Vigilante (67).
- You are a Town role for all intents and purposes except win condition/goal.
